Name: Fish House Punch #2
Ingredients: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
22.5 ml Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon slice & dust with grated nutmeg.
Review: Over the decades the recipe the Fish House Punch has constantly morphed. The inclusion of cold tea is a contemporary adaptation.
Nutrition: One serving of Fish House Punch #2 contains 237 calories
